title: Rule Number Five
description: I had my whole life planned out... until I met a hockey player obsessed with breaking all of my rules.My 5 simple rules for hooking up keep me from being distracted. And now Iâ€™m so close to landing my dream internship. Nothing is going to make me break them.Even a protective hockey player with clear grey eyes, a sharp jaw, and a body that makes my breath catch.Until Jax wins a bet and one kiss has me breaking them all.TROPES:SlowburnHe Falls FirstFriends with benefitsJealousyMutual pinning
author: Jessa Wilder
